title: Quiz: Get Loose And Match These British Celebrities With Whatever You Want
text:
Sure is, friend. That’s him. 4. You want to match Emily Blunt to a damn tarantula? Be our guest. You want to match Emily Blunt to a melting Emily Blunt? Hell, that’s perfect. Just do what feels right, and you’ll never be wrong. 
Whatever choice you made is the right choice, because YOU made it. :) 5. Just checking in real quick to make sure you’re real relaxed and having a blast. I’m floating like a leaf on a river, baby! I’m adjusting, but I’ll get there! 
That’s just honestly great to hear. 6. Hey, all right, it’s Daniel Craig! Match him to his most famous catchphrase, which is whatever you really and truly want it to be! Just trust your will and create your own truth. “What you call your face, I call my plate.” “Mother, you’ve birthed me!” “I’ve seen paradise, and it looks a lot like London’s own London Eye.” “I’d like to fuck you up…on my birthday.” “That’s CERTAINLY a concern!” 
Just tremendous. 7. How about matching John Boyega with some birds? If that doesn’t light up your circuits, that’s fine too! Not everyone goes for birds! None of the above. 
That’s great. That’s such a special choice. 8. We realized just one celebrity per question might be too much constraint, so take your pick! Don’t see one you want to match on here? Then forget these jokers! Don’t get hung up on details, because this is all about following your flow. 
Perfect. Results for Get Loose And Match These British Celebrities With Whatever You Want Wasn’t that nice? In our high-achieving, breakneck world of 24/7 hustling and nonstop grinding, the absence of structure can be a frightening, dizzying thing, like looking down the edge of a sheer cliff face. But it's on those precipices that our souls can finally breathe freely, and soar. Never forget the experience you had here, and hold fast to that spirit of openness, of free choice, of radical possibility. Keep it glowing like an ember in your heart.
